discussion.author: palmskog
discussion.comment:
@CohenCyril thanks, this is very much appreciated. 

While I think I understand the decision to keep it local, and this is fine with me, I still want to make a quick case for a non-local `Remark`:
- will appear in `Search` and coqdoc list of globals, so becomes more likely to find by those who might be interested why `merge_sort` is defined the way it is.
- there is now a full-fledged Coq library for [reasoning about complexity](https://github.com/uds-psl/coq-library-complexity), making this a potentially interesting case study where the remark is key.

commits.author: CohenCyril
commits.message:
Adding size_merge_sort_push

This documents the fact that `merge_sort_push` preserves an invariant on its second argument.
Importing a statement and proof by Georges Gonthier, inspired by one of Karl Palmskog's contribution.
